title: BIG FACTS feat. MAYOR KASIM REED
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. MAYOR KASIM REED
description:
The BIG FACTS squad links up with The 59th Mayor of Atlanta Kasim Reed for a sit down at Breakfast At Barneys in the heart of the ATL. The discussion entails the current crime crisis in ATL, why he is running for mayor again, gentrification, the ATL waterboys and so much more.
